channel.title: Outdoor on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in Outdoor on madewhere

item.title: Wilcox
item.description: Wilcox is a garden tool manufacturer, specializing in digging tools.

item.title: Felco
item.description: Felco is a Swiss garden tools manufacturer. They make a variety of shears, loppers, and other outdoor tools. Products origins are prominently listed on their individual pages.

item.title: Lawn Chair USA
item.description: Lawn Chair USA manufactures classic styled lawn chairs in the USA, as their name suggests.

item.title: Benchmade
item.description: Benchmade is an American knife manufacturer, which produces a wide range of knives in their Oregon City, OR factory. Since discontinuing their off-shore manufacturing in 2010, all of their products are USA-made.
